scripts.start:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up --build
scripts.publish:server: cd server && docker build -f Dockerfile.production . -t scrip/healthchecker && docker push scrip/healthchecker && cd ..
scripts.publish:client: cd client && docker build -f Dockerfile.production --build-arg REACT_APP_GRAPHQL_API_URL=https://api.pierre.wns.wilders.dev -t scrip/wns-livecodings-client . && docker push scrip/wns-livecodings-client && cd ..
scripts.publish-staging:server: cd server && docker build -f Dockerfile.staging . -t scrip/healthchecker-staging && docker push scrip/healthchecker-staging && cd ..
scripts.publish-staging:client: cd client && docker build -f Dockerfile.staging --build-arg REACT_APP_GRAPHQL_API_URL=https://api.staging.pierre.wns.wilders.dev -t scrip/wns-livecodings-client-staging . && docker push scrip/wns-livecodings-client-staging && cd ..
scripts.pgadmin: docker run --name pgadmin -p 5050:80 --env PGADMIN_DEFAULT_EMAIL=admin@admin.com --env PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD=root dpage/pgadmin4
